casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Buelow, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Buelow, 134 Ohio St.3d 589, 2012-Ohio-5764.]

(No. 2012-0631 Submitted December 4, 2012 Decided December 7, 2012.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Howard, 134 Ohio St.3d 467, 2012-Ohio-5738, 983 N.E.2d 341.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. *590Mathias H. Heck Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Johnna M. Shia, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Jennifer S. Getty, for appellee.
